Package com.sri.ai.grinder.core.solver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SingleQuantifierEliminationStepSolver
    An interface for step solvers for quantified expressions (the quantification being based on an associative commutative group's operation).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBooleanWithPropagatedLiteralsRequiringPropagatedLiteralsAndCNFToBeSatisfiedStepSolver
    A specialization of AbstractExpressionWithPropagatedLiteralsStepSolver that returns solution false if propagated literals and propagated CNF are not satisfied by the context.
    AbstractExpressionWithPropagatedLiteralsStepSolver
    An abstract implementation for step solvers for problems based on a propagated literals, and a propagated CNF.
    AbstractModelCountingWithPropagatedLiteralsImportedFromSatisfiabilityStepSolver
    An abstract step solver for model counting step solvers.
    AbstractMultiQuantifierEliminationProblem  
    AbstractMultiQuantifierEliminator
    A MultiQuantifierEliminator implementing interruption and debugging mechanisms.
    AbstractSGVET
    A MultiQuantifierEliminator generalizing the Variable Elimination algorithm in the same manner DefaultMultiQuantifierEliminator is generalized from DPLL, that is, it can produce symbolic answers and it does not need to only solve problems with the operations from its classic version (for the case of VE, sum and product, or max and product).
    AbstractSingleQuantifierEliminationStepSolver
    An abstract implementation for step solvers for quantified expressions (the quantification being based on an associative commutative group's operation).
    ContextDependentExpressionProblemSolver
    Solves a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver by successively conditioning the context on provided splitters.
    DefaultMultiQuantifierEliminationProblem  
    DefaultMultiQuantifierEliminator
    A MultiQuantifierEliminator implementation that eliminates each quantifier using the context's theory.
    DefaultSingleQuantifierEliminationProblem  
    ExpressionStepSolverToLiteralSplitterStepSolverAdapter
    An adapter that allows ExpressionStepSolvers to be used in situations where ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolvers are required (i.e.
    Integration  
    IntegrationRecording  
    MeasurableMultiQuantifierEliminationProblem
    A MultiQuantifierEliminationProblem that knows how to compute the measure of the domain satisfying its constraint.
    MeasurableSingleQuantifierEliminationProblem
    A SingleQuantifierEliminationProblem that knows how to compute the measure of the domain satisfying its constraint.
    MultiQuantifierEliminationProblemWrapper  
    QuantifierEliminationOnBodyInWhichIndexOnlyOccursInsideLiteralsStepSolver
    A AbstractSingleQuantifierEliminationStepSolver for quantifiers based on a group, and with body in which the index occurs in literals only.
    QuantifierEliminatorOfFunctionOnIntensionalSetTopRewriter
    A Switch extension solving aggregate functions on intensional sets, given the functor, group, and MultiQuantifierEliminator.
    QuantifierTopRewriter
    A TopRewriter solving quantified expressions, given the syntactic form type, group, and MultiQuantifierEliminator.
    SGVET
    A AbstractSGVET using DefaultMultiQuantifierEliminator as the eliminator for single quantifiers.
    SingleQuantifierEliminationForIndexFreeBody
    Quantifier elimination when the body does not contain the index by doing one of two things: if the group is idempotent, simplify to if condition for satisfiability of constraint then body else group's identity.
    SingleQuantifierEliminationProblemWrapper  
    TheorySolvedSingleQuantifierEliminationProblem
